subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Jacob deGrom, the Mets’ rookie starting pitcher, pitched six innings in his third loss of the season, with the Mets managing just two hits over the final four innings against the Brewers.
snippet: Jacob deGrom, the Mets’ rookie starting pitcher, pitched six innings in his third loss of the season, with the Mets managing just two hits over the final four innings against the Brewers.
